definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: It is easier to square the circle than to get round a mathematician.
sentences.chinese: 从数学家面前混过去比“化圆为方”还难。

sentences.english: It is what real mathematicians do, and it is also what 4-year-olds do.
sentences.chinese: 这是真正的数学家所从事的，亦是4岁的孩子玩的。

sentences.english: He who fully comprehends the method is a mathematician. Music has much resemblance to algebra.
sentences.chinese: 数学家是能完全领悟数学方法的人。

sentences.english: He is a famous ancient Chinese hydraulic engineer and mathematician.
sentences.chinese: 郭守敬是中国古代著名的水利工程师和数学家。

sentences.english: Hua Luogeng is a great mathematician.
sentences.chinese: 华罗庚是一位伟大的数学家。

sentences.english: Are you a natural mathematician , writer, or party planner?
sentences.chinese: 你是否天生是个数学家，作家或者宴会策划人？

sentences.english: Mathematicians broke the Japanese codes, and built the A-bomb.
sentences.chinese: 是数学家破解了日本的密码，建造了原子炸弹。

sentences.english: In fact, the great mathematician Karl Friedrich Gauss had his own version in 1800.
sentences.chinese: 伟大的数学家高斯1800年就创造过一个。

sentences.english: Right now, it seems to be focused on mathematicians.
sentences.chinese: 现在的用户似乎以数学家为主。

sentences.english: He refers directly to the mathematician Brouwer and his radical constructivism.
sentences.chinese: 他直接参考数学家布劳威尔和他的激进建构主义。

sentences.english: Mathematicians broke the Japanese codes and built A-bomb .
sentences.chinese: 是数学家破解了日军的密码，发明了原子弹。

sentences.english: And the young mathematician, Terrence Tao, who I met recently.
sentences.chinese: 年轻数学家陶哲轩教授，我们最近刚刚见过面。

sentences.english: But mathematicians are still to have their Mendeleev moment.
sentences.chinese: 但是数学家们仍然学要他们的门捷列夫。

sentences.english: Henri Poincaré, one of the leading mathematicians of the day, called it a “disease.”
sentences.chinese: 那时顶尖的数学家之一昂利彭加莱称它为“病害”。

sentences.english: They thought that God, while an unforgiving judge, was also a mathematician.
sentences.chinese: 他们认为上帝，毫不宽容的审判者，也是一位数学家。

definition: Henri Poincaré (1854-1912), French mathematician, physician and philosopher
variant of 費瑪|费玛[Fei4 ma3]

pinyin: ji4 suan4 ji1 ke1 xue2 jia1

definition: Leibnitz (name)/Gottfriend Wilhelm von Leibniz (1646-1716), German mathematician and philosopher, co-inventor of the calculus

pinyin: tian1 ti3 wu4 li3 xue2 jia1
